ComicInfo.Title: New York
ComicInfo.Summary:
Darrian is back in New York and in a bar chatting with blonde twins, Charity and Faith, when Jaynis and Adelle walk in. He leaves lamenting that New York isn't big enough to avoid the people he wants to and quoting Hamlet.
As he walk Dawn calls to him from where she is perched on a mailbox and is dismayed to mis identify the quote as Macbeth. Darrian reveal that since they met he has been seeing angels and demons.
Dawn gives him a gift of a Frank Sinatra LP cover containing Lucifer's halo telling him its his key to freedom from Heaven and Hell. She asks him to close his eyes for a surprise. He does and when he opens them she is gone. Moments later the angel Mikal arrives asking for the halo. Darrian refuses and at sword point he slays the angel with a sword. Next small demons arrive asking for the halo and he slays them all as well.
Words start to ring in his mind as he stares at Lucifer's halo.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-15 20:10:24. [CVDB40184]
ComicInfo.Characters: Adelle, Charity, Darrian Ashoka, Dawn, Faith, Jaynis Goldbaum, Lady Def, Mikal, Safety-Belt Man
